bs.label: Sum of the amounts paid in advance for capitalized costs that will be expensed with the passage of time or the occurrence of a triggering event and will be charged against earnings within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Also included are aggregate carrying amount of current assets, expected to be realized or consumed within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer), not separately presented in the balance sheet due to materiality considerations.
